name: Outcome Based Planning
description:
Don't only plan and ship things, create outcomes.


This template helps your team, discuss, align, and plan what's next. instead of solely focusing on things to ship or tasks to do, shift your teams focus on the outcomes they want to achieve together and the tasks or deliverables they'll need to work on to achieve those outcomes.


Big ups to ï»¿@Bendik Kristiansen for providing the basis via the Lean Coffee FigJam template.
